name: Spire of Stars
description:
Spire of Stars is a shooter centered around an unnamed protagonist defending the Spire of Stars Station from space invaders in the Andromeda galaxy. 

Game Controls:

 "A" or "Left Arrow" -Move left 

"D" or "Right Arrow" -Move right

"Spacebar" -Shoot/Start

Assets Used: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux
